titles.title: Blessed Are The Pure In Heart (classic hymn ea

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed are the pure in heart For they shall see our God The secret of the Lord is theirs Their soul is Christ's abode{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord who left the heavens Our life and peace to bring To dwell in lowliness with men Their pattern and their King{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He to the lowly soul Doth still Himself impart And for His dwelling and His throne Chooseth the pure in heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord we Thy presence seek May ours this blessing be Give us a pure and lowly heart A temple meet for Thee{/lang-eng}
